title: Expanding the Tango line!
body: Could we expand on the Tango skin line?  Currently, it's just Evelynn and Twisted Fate.  I could see some amazing visuals coming from this particular set.  Maybe something like Tango Jhin?  He definitely has the personality for it.

replies.body: I think just a dancing line in general would be fun. There's Marquise Vladimir and that incredible Ballerina Orianna fan art. Breakdancer lee sin... Pop-n-lockin' Ivern?
I'm gonna push out that other person's idea in this thread.  Tango Kindred would be really cool with some red visuals, rose petal effects, and the duality they have going on.
All I want to know about this line is, will TF/Eve still have a shared splash when she gets her Update?
I love this one.  It gives new life to dancing with death!

> [{quoted}](name=Angus The Bear,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=LbETbqcl,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-06-13T00:37:21.395+0000)
>
> I love this one.  It gives new life to dancing with death!

As if it needed it {{item:3812}} {{champion:119}}
The common suggestion is tango skins for Xayah and Rakan. That however would be awhile since they are the newest champions and it takes time for skins to release for newer champions.
But it only takes two to tango, thats why there's only two. Also Jhin associated with 2? Are you trying to break the league communities fragile minds?
